body: Gnomes must often protect their homes against unnatural or pestilential infestations. Gnomes with this racial trait gain a +2 dodge bonus to AC against aberrations, oozes, and vermin, and a +1 bonus on attack rolls against them because of their special training. This racial trait replaces defensive training and hatred.
name: Warden of Nature
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Gnomes/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Warden of Nature
